titles.title: To provide for Federal incarceration of undocumented criminal aliens and to provide for the transfer of closed military bases to the Justice Department for use as prison facilities for the incarceration of criminal aliens.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Installations and Facilities.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Law, Immigration, and Refugees.

bill.summary: 5/27/1993--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for Federal incarceration, upon State request, of undocumented criminal aliens. Authorizes the transfer of closed military bases for use as criminal alien incarceration facilities.
